Macchialina is a well known Italian spot in South Beach, yet it has held onto that small restaurant charm. Great food & service. Try the meat & cheese board, sunchoke salad, and any pasta!
Great staff, the food is amazing. Can be slow at times, and I the inside seating area can get loud. But well worth it.
This is my favorite restaurant on Miami Beach!

Pasta is made fresh in house. All vegetables are grown out back. It's in one of the older buildings on Miami Beach, but it has a nice quaint feeling to it. Food is amazing, and I definitely recommend their broccolini Caesar and their pasta ragu.

Pasta was delicious.  Ambiance was great! Service was only thing that wasn’t five stars, but the rest of the restaurant made up for that.  We only had 3 items, but all were delicious.  Smaller than expected, but in a good way.  Great Italian food!
Awesome local place on South Beach that isn't a tourist trap. It's a great little  charming place with excellent food and service. Tasting menu was on point and not pretentious.
Literally "okay" ..dinner for 2 was roughly $160 and it wasnt "omg" @ all....annnnd i was still hungry and i dont even eat that much.
Excellent staff service and meal.wine a little over prices
Good was average for the price. Literally no flavor in the food. Looks like they forgot even salt. Ambiance was good.
Excellent Italian made from fresh/local ingredients. Service was attentive. A bit noisy.
